channel.title: NEED HELP DESPERATE! Camera rotates around skyveiw (like cutscenes)
channel.description:
First of all i canno tell yu what base this is as i do not know, and if you can tell em how i can find out i would gladly edit this
Hey guys, for some reason my camera has started to rotate around the skyveiw instead of the players like in cut-scenes. here are some pics.
[IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/1zpnvus.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/2s1azib.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/168tt2c.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/ofopcn.png[/img]
If anyone can help me with this i would be very grateful
